div.h3: Add Credits to Balance: How It Works
div.p: Our system offers bonuses when you add credits to your balance in advance. Here's how it works:

ol.li: Monthly Fee Basis: Each credit top-up is calculated based on a standard monthly fee. When you pay in advance, the system automatically calculates the number of months covered by your payment.

Bonus for Multiple Months: The more months you pay for in advance, the higher the bonus you’ll receive. This means that, on top of the months you've paid for, you'll get extra credits as a thank-you for committing to a longer period.

Automatic Bonus Calculation: Our system applies a specific bonus multiplier to your payment based on the number of months covered. You don’t need to do any extra steps; the system will calculate and apply the bonus credits automatically.
Balance Update: Once your payment is processed, your balance will be updated with the total credits, including any bonuses, so you’ll see a higher amount in your account than what you paid for.

div.strong: This system allows you to maximize value by planning ahead. Enjoy added credits every time you commit to multiple months!
